entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reading compressed encrypted Stream 60x slower on Net6 than Net Framework #83909
  • [API Proposal]: bigdecimal #83907
  • NativeAOT size conscious authoring observations #83902
    Future
  • Platform_TimeZoneNames failing for Iran time zones on macOS #83901
  • [NativeAOT] Rare stress crash due to unwalkable transition frame capturing a hijacked return address. #83900
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Rare deadlock when two threads try to suspend runtime #83898
    8.0.0
  • [android] .NET 8 performance regression in System.Reflection.MethodInfo/ConstructorInfo.Invoke() #83893
    8.0.0
  • Add VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension support in mono #83891
  • Underutilization of TimerQueue when application runs with CPU affinity #83890
  • Wrong cancellation token raised by `StreamPipeReader.ReadAsync` and `ReadAtLeastCore` #83885
  • [wasm] Implement new intrinsics for Vector128 methods #83884
    8.0.0
  • mono gc hangs on ppc64le .net builds #83879
  • [HTTP/3] Alt-Svc logic has many issues #83874
    Future
  • LINQ Array Performance #83871
  • Remove SyntaxTree rooting from interop source generators #83870
    8.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress does not working properly #83869

Closed

  • [Wasm] Out of bounds memory access in System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles tests #83214
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 Failed SSL Connection at andoird api 21 download #82514
  • System.OutOfMemoryException when allocating jump stub on macOS ARM64 #83818
  • Stack overflow static abstract interface methods, and struct types #78866
    8.0.0
  • DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.InspectLocalsWithSameNameInDifferentScopesInAsyncMethod_CSharp times out #83449
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort has no IntelliSense documentation #79030
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82055
    8.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext: IsValueType: NotSupportedException: Modified types do not support this member #83679
    8.0.0
  • [3.1] Deadlock during EventPipe session stop #51579
    Future
  • Blazor WASM closes/chrashes when starting debugging session with breakpoints #83785
  • Could not load file or assembly 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0'...... in System.Resources.ResourceManager .NET6.0 #83730
  • Required and init only property custom setters are ignored for source gen #83878
  • mono gc: assert on !sgen_concurrent_collection_in_progress #83817
    8.0.0
  • [TestFailure] Listener_BacklogLimitRefusesConnection_ParallelClients_ClientThrows_Slow fails on ARM #82769
    Future
  • Handling callbacks with the LibraryImport source generator #82017
  • Static executable on Alpine Linux published with gcc is failing #83791
  • IsAssignableFrom isn't working with generic interfaces and classes #83858
  • [globalization] Get CultureInfo.NumberFormat may throw IndexOutOfRangeException #83764
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: import entire method for OSR, prune unneeded parts later #83910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a read-out-of-local error in the MD library. #83906
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update the hardcoded dotnet-version with channels #83905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #83899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Libraries area pod updates for March 2023, plus some fabricbot maintenance #83897
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd bit shift intrinsics #83896
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Regression tests to merged test groups #83895
    test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Prepare ComInterfaceGenerator for going into the public API #83894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Exclude a source-gen test project from NativeAOT #83881
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix false PASS JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/DivConst.cs #83880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Disable test failing on bad Alt-Svc header #83876
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP #83873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83819
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental handling in regex generator #83868
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for issue #78866 and regression test #83697
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][jit] Disabled SIMD operator intrinsics on arm64. #83889
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][jit] Increased max length of OP_STOREX_MEMBASE to 16 on arm64. #83887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix null dereference when logging enabled on 32-bit platforms in HostCodeHeap::InitializeHeapList() #83875
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace load with cheaper move instr for stack loads on Arm64 (Followup of #83458) #83886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Exclude PInvoke with function pointer in TimeZoneTests from wasm compilation #83805
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Work around NuGet-Migrations issue #83832
    area-Build-mono
  • Dump Jit flags textually in mcs #83865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add note to doc about not specifying `hostfxr_initialize_parameters::dotnet_root` #83802
    area-Host
  • Move version.cpp out of hostcommon - only used by hostpolicy #83864
    area-Host
  • enable SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on arm32 Ubuntu #83799
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Handle custom modifiers on parameter constraints #83850
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Disabled SIMD operator intrinsics on arm64. #83888
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update Microsoft.Build.* SDKs #83877
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83835
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update PartitionerStatic.cs #83867
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • [mono][sgen] Remove outdated assertion #83824
    area-GC-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • Explicitly require `.eh_frame_hdr` section #83866
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83849
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • More precise fix for #83792 #83856
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Stop creating "location" commas #83814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement the STJ.DisableDefaultReflection feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add ability specify core_root when run #82387
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Issue 83667 #83820
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
